# orion-tab-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                      | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `for`        | `for`         | Specifies which orion-tabs element this panel is bound to. Set by a parent orion-tabs component. | `string`  | `''`    |
| `isActive`   | `is-active`   | Marks the panel as active or not                                                                 | `boolean` | `false` |
| `panelIndex` | `panel-index` | Index of tab that controls if this panel is active. Set by a parent orion-tabs component.        | `number`  | `-1`    |
